about_the_game: Legendary game composer Lennie Moore returns to the world of Outcast with 40 rousing orchestral tracks that evoke Adelpha’s otherworldly beauty. With contributions from cellist Tina Guo, percussionist Manu Delago, and several other acclaimed musicians, this OST captures the sense of adventure and wonder that you will experience as you uncover more of Outcast – A New Beginning’s unique world.
